data.text: @GoRepub @Gonzaga_Prez @GonzagaU Hope you become a former student by not adhering to school policy.
@Gonzaga_Prez @GonzagaU Gonzaga- Catholic in name only. And now Higher Education in name only! What a bunch of liberal/power hungry clowns. #GUsucksMasks #GUweSTILLhateTheFlag #GUstillOVERRATED
@Gonzaga_Prez @GonzagaU Study the size of viruses, germs and bacteria. Now study that 99% of masks are 20 times larger. Go ask your pope of science please.

@Gonzaga_Prez So to be clear; if someone chooses to continue masking they are to be treated with respect, but if someone chose not to mask (understanding that their impact to “the greater good” is infinitesimal) they are to be shunned, ridiculed and ostracized. Got it,Maybe more boosters too👍
